bibl.author: Walt Whitman
bibl.title: Walt Whitman to Herbert Gilchrist, 25 December [1878]
bibl.orgName: Walt Whitman Collection, 1842–1957, Rare Book & Manuscript Library, University of Pennsylvania

revisionDesc.change: added image references and updated transcription

body.p: Yours of day before yesterday rec'dreceived—I am well as usual, & bustling about—Sister and brother well—Bitter cold & gusty gales here for two days—I don't go out so much—Went over Sunday morning to foot of Arch St. Phila. to breakfast on a steamer—bountiful breakfast—jolly democratic three hours—I have written to Miss Jenny G.—I sent John Burroughs your Brooklyn address—he & wife are away spending Christmas holidays—I shall send him your present address—havn't seen E's portrait yet—I am writing this up in my room—Sun shines out as I finish
